verbs.description: [V: recovering] [ARG1: addicts] find support and community at sober gym there are no initiation fees to join no monthly dues the only requirements are 48 hours of sobriety and a will to get your life back the phoenix dresden scott strode more perfect union dana smith denver airo cbs phoenix community dana jacobson dana
